document.masterDocTitle: Unexpected discovery of a new Podonychus species in Kyushu, Japan (Coleoptera, Elmidae, Elminae, Macronychini)

caption.paragraph: Table 1. Character matrix of Macronychini genera. Abbreviations: parameres (a = absent; p = present); basal piece (s: short; l: long); hind wing (B: brachypterous; M: macropterous; MI: micropterous).
